abstract: Free Tibet, advocacy group, reports the 10th Tibetan self-immolation as monk in China's Sichuan Province sets himself on fire to protest China's policies toward Tibet.
snippet: The group Free Tibet said the self-immolation happened outside a monastery in Garze, and that the monk’s identity, condition and whereabouts were not known.
lead_paragraph: The group Free Tibet said the self-immolation happened outside a monastery in Garze, and that the monk’s identity, condition and whereabouts were not known.

headline.main: Tenth Tibetan Reported to Self-Immolate in Anti-China Protest
headline.seo: Tibetan Monk Said to Set Himself on Fire in Protest
